title: Crazy Moto Racing

headings.text: How to Play Crazy Moto Racing

controls: Arrow keys / WASD: Steer your bikeSpacebar: BrakeShift: Activate Nitro boost
content.howToPlay: Select between Race Mode or Time Attack Mode.In race mode, compete against two rivals and aim for first place. The better your finish, the more coins you earn!In Time Attack mode, race against the clock! Avoid cutting corners in Time Attack Mode to prevent penalty time.Using nitro at the right moment can be the difference between first and second place.With ten different courses, each offering unique twists and turns, precision and strategy are key to winning.Use earned coins to buy two additional motorcycles for better speed and handling. The first bike costs 300 coins, and the best bike costs 2700 coins.Complete various achievements like winning races, setting records, and unlocking all bikes.

fullContent: Home› BikeCrazy Moto RacingBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCrazy Moto Racing is an online 3D motorcycle racing game that puts your speed and skill to the test. You might think that speed is your buddy here. But let me assure you; control is your actual buddy. You can enjoy competing against rivals or racing against time. This free online bike game delivers the action you've been craving across ten unique tracks. With two game modes, unlockable bikes, and a variety of achievements, every race feels like a new challenge. So, get ready to push your limits, avoid penalties, and aim for victory!If you love high-speed racing, Crazy Moto Racing delivers action-packed gameplay with realistic 3D visuals, multiple game modes, unlockable bikes, and achievements that will keep you coming back for more. To explore more online bike games, visit our full collection and let us know which one is your favorite.ControlsArrow keys / WASD: Steer your bikeSpacebar: BrakeShift: Activate Nitro boostHow to Play Crazy Moto RacingSelect between Race Mode or Time Attack Mode.In race mode, compete against two rivals and aim for first place. The better your finish, the more coins you earn!In Time Attack mode, race against the clock! Avoid cutting corners in Time Attack Mode to prevent penalty time.Using nitro at the right moment can be the difference between first and second place.With ten different courses, each offering unique twists and turns, precision and strategy are key to winning.Use earned coins to buy two additional motorcycles for better speed and handling. The first bike costs 300 coins, and the best bike costs 2700 coins.Complete various achievements like winning races, setting records, and unlocking all bikes.Game ModesRace Mode: Face off against two AI opponents and aim to finish in first place. Consistently winning helps you progress through all ten tracks.Time Attack Mode: Speed through the track and set new records. Be mindful of penalties if you go off course!AchievementsTest your skills by completing these milestones:Victory Lap – Finish in first place.Newcomer – Play Race Mode.Speedster – Play Time Attack Mode.Always Number 1 – Get three stars on all race levels.Racing Champion – Complete all ten Race Mode tracks.Time Champion – Complete all ten Time Attack Mode tracks.Fast as Lightning – Use nitro for the first time.Fast Qualifier – Set a new time record.Completionist – Finish all 20 levels across both modes.Making Progress – Complete five levels.Casual Racer – Win five races without using nitro.No Scratch – Win a race without colliding.Good Investment – Purchase a new motorcycle.Trifecta – Own all three bikes.Wreck – Complete all race tracks using only the first bike.Skilled Racer – Earn three stars on all Time Attack levels.Lost on Track – Drive the wrong way on the course.Speed Addict – Use nitro for a total of 1000 seconds.The First to Lose – Finish a race in second place.LOL n00b – Lose five races in a row.Who Created Crazy Moto Racing?This game was developed by FreezeNova.Embed URL:https://cloud.onlinegames.io/games/2022/unity3/crazy-moto-racing/index-og.htmlThis article was updated on February 3, 20251 Player3DBikeDrivingEmbeddableEndlessFreeRacingSpeedUnity
